meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Donald Vanderweit Gillian Bagwell Kurt Bray Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2155.

td.p: Donald Vanderweit, a technical writer from Los Angeles, California
Gillian Bagwell, an actress originally from Berkeley, California
Kurt Bray, a scientist from Oceanside, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $34,700)

tr.td: ANIMALS
CLASSIC CINEMA
ARCHITECTURE
TRANSPORTATION
IT HAD TO BE "U"
